moves.1. d4 d5 2. e4: i ve been playing a lot of stonewall, so i diced to play more risky to  change
moves.2... dxe4 3. f3 exf3 4. Nxf3 Nf6 5. c3 e: i 'm still not ready, so oponent will take the initiative
moves.6... c5 7. O-O cxd4 8. Nxd4: i want to keep the C3 pawn
moves.8... Bc5 9. Be3: the idea is to take back with the bishop then attack the  knight f6
moves.12... Bxd4 13. Bxd4 Qxd4+ 14. Kh1: no more f6 attack and i'm -2    i will try to attack this black queen
moves.14... g6 15. Nc3: in order to move Ra d1 and then ...Bxh7+ ...Rxd4
moves.15... a6 16. Rad1 Qc5: i still can attack the knight
moves.17. Qf3 Nh5: so now i have to change again my plan ! let's put the knight in f6!
moves.18. Ne4 Qe7 19. g4: so this was the good idea ! weakening the castle but wining some very attacking position
moves.19... Ng7 20. Nf6+ Kh8 21. g5: perhap this was a tempo lost ?
moves.21... Rb8 22. Qh3 Nh5 23. Be2 b5: i have time to take the knight
moves.24. Bxh5 gxh5 25. Qxh5: and no special risk, queen and LSB wont be enought to mate me
moves.25... Bb7+ 26. Kg1 Qc5+ 27. Rf2: and so waht ??? black is in BIG trouble
moves.29. Nxg8 Rxg8 30. Qxg8+ Kxg8: i'm +5 anyway, the game is won !
